DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect Nordic diet rich plant-based food fish indicator cardiovascular disease risk two different level salt intake . The study 20-wk randomize control crossover trial . The subject follow salt-restricted diet study . The study begin 4-wk run-in phase subject . After subject randomly allocate one two group . Group 1 consumes healthy Nordic low-salt diet enrich plant-based food fish 16 week . Group 2 consumes low-salt diet 16 week . During 16 week , group receive salt placebo capsule double-blind , crossover fashion ( 8+8 week ) .
DOC.brief_title: Health Effects Nordic Diet Rich Plant-based Foods Fish
DOC.criteria: prehypertension hypertension ( systolic blood pressure 130159 mmHg diastolic blood pressure 8599 mmHg ) smoking regular use medication intestinal disorder symptomatic cardiovascular disease obesity ( BMI > 35 kg/m2 ) vegetarianism high intake alcohol allergy fish pregnancy
